name: Overall Performance
query: SELECT json_extract_string(t.participants::json, '$.' || json_keys(t.participants::json)[1]) AS id, json_extract_string(CAST(t.results[1].summary AS JSON), '$.domain') AS Domain, ROUND(CAST(json_extract(CAST(t.results[1].summary AS JSON), '$.avg_reward') AS DOUBLE) * 100, 1) AS "Pass %", ROUND(CAST(json_extract(CAST(t.results[1].summary AS JSON), '$.avg_difficulty') AS DOUBLE), 2) AS "Avg Difficulty", CAST(json_extract(CAST(t.results[1].summary AS JSON), '$.total_tasks') AS INTEGER) AS Tasks, CAST(json_extract(CAST(t.results[1].summary AS JSON), '$.successful_simulations') AS INTEGER) AS Passed FROM results t ORDER BY "Pass %" DESC

name: Reliability (Pass^k)
query: SELECT json_extract_string(t.participants::json, '$.' || json_keys(t.participants::json)[1]) AS id, json_extract_string(CAST(t.results[1].summary AS JSON), '$.domain') AS Domain, ROUND(CAST(json_extract(CAST(t.results[1].summary.pass_hat_k AS JSON), '$."1"') AS DOUBLE) * 100, 1) AS "Pass^1", ROUND(CAST(json_extract(CAST(t.results[1].summary.pass_hat_k AS JSON), '$."2"') AS DOUBLE) * 100, 1) AS "Pass^2", ROUND(CAST(json_extract(CAST(t.results[1].summary.pass_hat_k AS JSON), '$."3"') AS DOUBLE) * 100, 1) AS "Pass^3", CAST(json_extract(CAST(t.results[1].summary AS JSON), '$.num_trials') AS INTEGER) AS Trials FROM results t ORDER BY "Pass^1" DESC

name: By Domain
query: SELECT json_extract_string(t.participants::json, '$.' || json_keys(t.participants::json)[1]) AS id, json_extract_string(CAST(t.results[1].summary AS JSON), '$.domain') AS Domain, ROUND(CAST(json_extract(CAST(t.results[1].summary AS JSON), '$.avg_reward') AS DOUBLE) * 100, 1) AS "Pass %", ROUND(CAST(json_extract(CAST(t.results[1].summary AS JSON), '$.avg_difficulty') AS DOUBLE), 2) AS "Avg Difficulty", CAST(json_extract(CAST(t.results[1].summary AS JSON), '$.total_tasks') AS INTEGER) AS Tasks FROM results t ORDER BY Domain, "Pass %" DESC
